article_node.title: Adyen Says Embedded Finance Helps Businesses Deal With Macro Challenges
article_node.summary: Adyen reported strong growth in its key metrics for the first half of 2025, with a 20% increase in net revenue, 5% in processed volume, and 28% in EBITDA. Despite challenges such as reduced volume from Asia-based companies and the impact of a strong euro, the company expanded its customer base and deepened relationships with existing clients. Co-CEO Ingo Uytdehaage highlighted opportunities for growth through improved authorization rates and geographic expansion, while also preparing to adapt to emerging trends like stablecoins and autonomous agents in online commerce.
